sentences: Meillä on pieni ryhmä lasta päivähoidossa.
Ryhmän työ oli hyvin järjestetty ja tehokasta.
context: The Finnish word 'ryhmä' means 'group' in English. It is a common noun used to refer to a collection of people or things that are together for some purpose, such as a study group, work team, class of students, or any organized assembly. The word can be declined in various cases: ryhmässä (in the group), ryhmään (into the group), ryhmän (of the group), etc.
